word_mean: 聚合物，聚合体：由简单的重复分子(或多个单体)呈线形结合而成的化合物，常具有高分子量。在免疫学，指由一个以上的四链单体的单位聚集而成的免疫球蛋白，例如IgM和IgA都有与分子聚合有关的J链

sentence.Network_en: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

sentence.Network_en: Coverage of polymer particles is obviously influenced by emulsifier structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然聚合物胶粒总数受乳化剂结构的影响.

sentence.Network_cn: 将1%苯基 - β - 萘胺作为抗氧化剂加到所得到的聚合物中.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German, from Greek polumeros 'having many parts', from polu- 'many' + meros 'a share'

entry.def: A polymer is a chemical compound with large molecules made of many smaller molecules of the same kind. Some polymers exist naturally and others are produced in laboratories and factories.

means.word_mean: 1. a naturally occurring or synthetic compound consisting of large molecules made up of a linked series of repeated simple monomers
